FILE: cm811840v11.0.txt
DYAD: CAMBODIA/KAMPUCHEA - PHILIPPINES
RIVALRY: RIV1357
DISPUTE(S): MID3300 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170521
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170521

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3300

TERRMID: MID3300 3 -- not territorial 
TERRMID-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain
TERRMID-NOTES:

TERRLINK: MID3300 3 -- not third party linked to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID: MID3300 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID3300 from Gibler 2018 and New York Times (1968), on 10 July 1968, the New York Times printed a very brief story that documented Cambodia releasing a tugboat to the Philippine ambassador. The boat had been seized in Cambodian waters in May, and the crew had been released in June. Coded not maritime because they were not disputing a maritime boundary. 

ISLMID: MID3300 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES:

CIVWARMID-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3300 3 -- not civil war LINK
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID: MID3300 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3300 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3300 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.

"Cambodia Frees Tugboat." New York Times 10 July 1968, accessed via Proquest Historical Newspapers: The New York Times. See MID documentation.
